review.title: “Good place to work. Nice people. Normal work frustrations”
review.pros: Pros – Very nice group of people. Relatively good pay. Management understands the need for life outside of work. For a company this size they have good benefits and they really do seem to care for the employees.
review.cons: Cons – Very little room for advancement. No real leadership. Expectations of management are not communicated to employees. Generally poor communication throughout the company.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Look up the word strategic in the dictionary and try to use it in a sentence.
